component.ingredient_statement:
Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Caramel Flavour Filling (21%) (Chicory Root Fibre, Allergen Ingredient: Sweetened Condensed Whole MILK, Water, Butter (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Salt, Thickener (Pectins), Natural Flavour), Water, Caramel Flavour Coating (12%) (Vegetable Fats (Palm, Palm Kernel, Shea, Rapeseed), Sugar, Dried Glucose Syrup, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Butter (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder, Emulsifier (Sunflower Lecithin), Salt, Colour (Paprika Extract), Natural Flavour), Vegetable Fats (Palm, Rapeseed), Biscuit Pieces (5%) (Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Sugar, Palm Oil, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Glucose-Fructose Syrup, Salt, Raising Agent (Sodium Hydrogen Carbonate), Natural Flavour), Cocoa Drizzle (4%) (Vegetable Fats (Palm, Palm Kernel, Shea, Rapeseed), Dried Glucose Syrup, Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder (0.7%), Sugar, Whey Powder (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Emulsifier (Sunflower Lecithin), Salt, Natural Vanilla Flavour, Acidity Regulator (Citric Acid)), Margarine (Vegetable Oils (Palm, Rapeseed), Water, Emulsifier (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids), Salt, Acidity Regulator (Citric Acid), Natural Flavouring), Yeast, Allergen Ingredient: Free Range Whole EGG Powder, Invert Sugar Syrup, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Sugar, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Gluten, Salt, Potato Fibre, Emulsifiers (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids, Mono- and Diacetyl Tartaric Acid Esters of Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids, Sodium Stearoyl-2-Lactylate), Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid).
Potential Allergen Ingredient: N.B. May contain traces of soya and oat.

item.description: An indulgent iced caramel doughnut with gooey caramel filling, topped with biscuit pieces and a dark cocoa drizzle.

footer.footer_name36: Allergy Advice: For allergens including cereals containing gluten see ingredients in BOLD
footer.footer_name41: We produce our food in kitchens where allergens are handled by our people, and where equipment and utensils are used for multiple menu items, including those containing allergens.  Although your meal is prepared with care, we cannot guarantee it will be allergen free, even after ingredients have been removed on request. While there are no nuts or peanut ingredients in the products listed we can’t guarantee that our food is completely nut or peanut free.

item.item_allergen: Egg, Gluten, Milk, Wheat|May also contain May Contain Oat, May Contain Soy.

item.item_meta_description: An indulgent iced caramel donut with gooey caramel filling, topped with biscuit pieces and a dark cocoa drizzle. Click here to find out more.
